issue.title: [CI] Add crossbow notifications
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6448](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6448). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6448?focusedCommentId=16921905) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
A once daily summary of nightly test failures to dev@ would be nice. More notifications than that and it may annoy subscribers

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6448?focusedCommentId=16921911) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Annoy subscribers enough to get them to fix the issues? ;) 

But seriously, we need to fix the current failures, and once we have, and we have notifications to keep a bunch of failures from piling up, shouldn't this notification channel stay pretty quiet?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6448?focusedCommentId=16921923) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
If there's 15 failures, we should _not_ send 15 e-mails. If we can't figure out how to send a summary e-mail then we can create a new mailing list for these notifications so we aren't spamming dev@

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6448?focusedCommentId=16922611) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
I have a pending PR for this https://github.com/ursa-labs/ursabot/pull/122

`[~fsaintjacques]` what is your solution?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6448?focusedCommentId=16932343) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Does something remain to do here?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6448?focusedCommentId=16933886) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I think the nightly e-mail is sufficient
